vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) because it uses the 'urlPath' from the request to read a file without validating or sanitizing the input. This could allow an attacker to read arbitrary files on the server by sending a request with a crafted URL. Additionally, the function is vulnerable to Information Exposure Through an Error Message (CWE-209) because it includes detailed error information in the response. This could provide an attacker with valuable information about the system.
